### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Canadian Centre for Agri Food Research in Health and Medicine in Winnipeg, Manitoba requires the supply and delivery of an advanced plate reader system. The proposed system should meet the specifications outlined in the original tender.

### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2023-11-03 at 2:00 p.m. EDT.
* Bids received after 2:00 p.m. EDT will be deemed non-responsive.
* Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting and Canada Buys posting closing times.

This rewritten entry has adhered to best practices for government tender announcements, providing essential details for respondents while ensuring clarity and concision. The formatting is consistent with accepted industry standards, and all relevant information is easily accessible. Animal-towers of unnecessary information have been surmounted.
